title.rendered: How do I search for a room on Roomi?

content.rendered:
Here are instructions for searching for a room on Roomi.

Web

  • Login to your account from our homepage by clicking Log In in the top right-hand corner
  • Click Browse Listings from the menu in the top left-hand corner
  • You can type a street, city, or area in the search bar to bring up any listings that are currently available. You can also set filters such as neighborhood, move date, neighborhood, duration, budget, and more. Click More Filters under the search bar to add any additional filters and then click Apply Filters

IOS

  • Tap Browse in the bottom left corner of the dashboard
  • Tap Listings in the top left cornerIf you want to search near your current location or an address, tap the map icon in the top left corner. You can also tap the filter icon in the top right corner
  • If you want to narrow your search even further. Tap Apply after selecting your filters to bring up your results.

Android

  • Tap the menu icon in the top left corner (represented by three stacked horizontal lines)
  • Tap Browse ListingsIf you want to search near your current location or an address, tap the map icon in the top right corner. You can also tap the filter icon in the bottom right corner
  • If you want to narrow your search even further. Once you have selected your filter options, tap the back arrow in the top left corner to bring up your results.

jetpack-related-posts.title: How to search for rooms that allow couples
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: To filter rooms that allow couples, follow these steps: Web Login to your Roomi account from our homepageClick Browse Listings from the menu in the top left cornerClick More Filters under the search barClick Couples OK under the House Rules filtersClick Apply Filters iOS Tap Browse in the bottom left…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Browsing and finding rooms for rent
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Need help finding the perfect place? No worries! Web Login to your account from our homepage by clicking Log In in the top right-hand cornerClick  Rooms for rent from the menu in the top left-hand cornerYou can type a street, city, or area in the search bar to bring up any…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I permanently delete my room listing?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Web Please note: Your listing must be deactivated before it can be deleted. Login to your Roomi account from our homepage and click My ListingsClick the Inactive tabClick the trash can icon to delete your listing iOS Tap on My Listings from the menu at the bottomTap the X icon…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I deactivate my listing?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Deactivating your listing will take it out of the search results while giving you the option to re-activate it at a later time. As soon as the listing is deactivated you will need a listing credit in order to reactivate it. When you reactivate your listing you will need to…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I boost my listing?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: We offer the option to boost your listing if you need to fill your room quickly. This feature pushes your listing to the top of the search page in your area, enabling users to see your room first when searching for a place. Listing Boosts are non-refundable Web Login to…

jetpack-related-posts.title: How do I share my listing via SMS, email, Facebook, or other methods?
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Web Login to your Roomi account and click My ListingsClick on the listing you want to share from the Active Listings tabClick the listing photo to preview the listing and you can copy and paste the URL. You can also click and share via the Twitter, Facebook, or Email icons…
